content.description: SitÂ Start on the right facing crimps following the arete to the top going left.
content.location: To the right of Blade knife

content.description:
Most people will never climb this line. Stand start with whatever sharp disgusting features you can find for your hands. Incut iron blades that leave pressure wounds in your finger tips are the most useful. Close your eyes and image a foothold. Stand up on that imaginary foothold and pray it doesn't pop (it will and you will lose your finger tips). Reach for the finger lock in the center of the face and the topout over the lip. Avoid the right arete with your hands for full value.

(Please only give this one a bomb after you have sent :D)
content.protection: a towel to keep your shoes clean and superglue for your fingertips. Maybe Advil.
content.location: This short blank slab is directly on the footpath up to the Gnome Boulder. (On the north side of the road right before the bulk of area 5)
